LanguageData.Dragonfruit.label: dragonfruit
LanguageData.Dragonfruit.description: Delicate exotic fruit plant that can only be grown in rich soil.
LanguageData.ExoticMeal.label: exotic meal
LanguageData.ExoticMeal.description: A weak flavoured but very nutritional meal, prepared with a mix dragonfruit and other vegetables with a side of meat.
